method.name: getClassLoaderScope
method.description: Returns the scope into which the main settings script should define classes, and from which plugins applied to this settings object should be resolved.

method.name: getRootClassLoaderScope
method.description: Returns the scope containing classes that should be visible to all settings and build scripts invoked by this build.

property.name: classLoaderScope
property.description: Returns the scope into which the main settings script should define classes, and from which plugins applied to this settings object should be resolved.

property.name: rootClassLoaderScope
property.description: Returns the scope containing classes that should be visible to all settings and build scripts invoked by this build.
